title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When resizing the Navigator view on Linux using build 20011127 (not observed on build 20011116 on Nt2000), the tool items below the label move down.
EB: The tool items below the label should remain in their original position when resizing the Navigator view on Linux.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Navigator view on Linux. 
2. Resize the view to make it smaller. 
3. Observe that the tool items below the label move down.
